name: Stick Together (Crispy Chicken)
description:
Made for Game Maker Tool Kit's Game Jam 2021. The Theme was Joined Together. Use WASD or Arrow keys to move. Click R to Restart the current level.

Objective: Have any block reach the flag. The Red block is the player. The player can touch a white block to have them "join" them, but if any Red block collides with a wall when moving, they turn back into a red block. You can only push Green Blocks.

Please Fullscreen if it doesn't fit your screen.

Psst..... Cheats

 If you are ever stuck, you can use "p" to skip to the next level or "o" to move back.

Notes: There seems to be a bug on Level 12 with the holes. Please skip that level.
